Reference

Read cells

Import data from a Sheet into a local data frame

read_sheet() sheets_read()

Read a Sheet into a data frame

sheets_speedread()

Read Sheet as CSV

sheets_cells()

Read cells from a Sheet

spread_sheet()

Spread a data frame of cells into spreadsheet shape

cell-specification

Specify cells

Write cells

Write data from a local data frame into a Sheet

write_sheet() sheets_write()

(Over)write new data into a worksheet

sheets_create()

Create a new Sheet

sheets_append()

Append rows to a sheet

sheets_edit()

(Over)write new data into a range

sheets_formula()

Class for Google Sheets formulas

Metadata on Sheets

Helpers for accessing Sheets and their metadata

sheets_get()

Get Sheet metadata

sheets_find()

Find Google Sheets

sheets_browse()

Visit Sheet in browser

as_sheets_id()

Coerce to a sheets_id object

sheets_id

sheets_id object

sheets_random()

Generate a random Sheet name

Modify a Sheet

Make changes to a (spread)Sheet or to the (work)sheets it contains

sheets_create()

Create a new Sheet

sheets_sheet_add()

Add one or more (work)sheets

sheets_sheet_delete()

Delete one or more (work)sheets

sheets_sheet_properties() sheets_sheet_names()

Get data about (work)sheets

sheets_sheet_resize()

Change the size of a (work)sheet

Formatting and aesthetics

Change how a Sheet appears in the browser UI

sheets_auto_resize_dims()

Auto-resize columns or rows

Example Sheets

World-readable Sheets to use in examples and reprexes

sheets_example() sheets_examples()

File IDs of example Sheets

Auth

Take explicit control of the googlesheets4 auth status or examine current state

sheets_auth()

Authorize googlesheets4

sheets_deauth()

Suspend authorization

sheets_user()

Get info on current user

sheets_auth_configure() sheets_api_key() sheets_oauth_app()

Edit and view auth configuration

Programming around the Sheets API

Low-level functions used internally and made available for programming

request_generate()

Generate a Google Sheets API request

request_make()

Make a Google Sheets API request

sheets_token()

Produce configured token

sheets_has_token()

Is there a token on hand?

sheets_endpoints()

List Sheets endpoints

googlesheets4 is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
